desc: G-spot lures is the newest handmade timber lure company to hit Australia. Based in Melbourne, we specialise in stickbaits stickbait and poppers popper. Topwater Fishing and casting lures is becoming ever more popular and are looking to specialise in all aspects of lure fishing. Our stickbaits and poppers will impress.

layout.text: Get your hands on a G-SPOT today!!!

Artisan hand crafted lures
Designed in Australia for all your Aussie fishing pleasures
